;@+leo-ver=5-thin
;@+node:ekr.20101027070126.1603: * @thin nsi-uninstall-files.txt
;@@language nsi

; Uninstall files...

; Delete top-level files...
Delete "$INSTDIR\LICENSE.txt"
Delete "$INSTDIR\Makefile"
Delete "$INSTDIR\launchLeo.py"
Delete "$INSTDIR\leo-4.8-a1.nsi"
Delete "$INSTDIR\leo_to_html.xsl"
Delete "$INSTDIR\profileLeo.py"
Delete "$INSTDIR\pylint-leo.bat"
Delete "$INSTDIR\pylint-leo.py"
Delete "$INSTDIR\uninst.exe"

; Recursively delete the leo directory and everything in it.

RMDir /r "$INSTDIR\leo"

; Delete the top-level directory.
RMDir "$INSTDIR"
;@-leo
